title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.3 - Races for two-, three- and four-year-olds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4029.3 - Races for two-, three- and four-year-olds

State Regulations

In races exclusively for three-year-olds or
four-year-olds the weight is 126 pounds, and in races exclusively for
two-year-olds, it is 122 pounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4029.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
